title: My Favorite Character Proposed a Contractual Relationship - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Contracts   Curses   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation
author: 제비끛따다
description:
In her previous life, Alaina read a mind-boggling novel.

A novel called 「The Curse of The Witch」 is about a witch that torments the male lead by cursing him, and then she meets a miserable end.

Coincidentally the male lead, Nicklaus, was Alaina’s favorite character.

Oh, and, the world that she was reborn into was inside that novel.

The brief happiness of meeting her favorite character aside, Nicklaus began courting her in search of true love to break his curse.

“All of my firsts are yours.”

Alaina only shrugged her shoulders as if nothing ever happened.

“You’ll have to try harder in the future. I am not that kind of person who easily gives their heart.”

“I’ll easily give you all of my heart.”

“I can’t wait.”>
